data.title: Abstracts of Short Communications and Posters of the ICM 1998
data.text:
ICM 1998

International Congress of Mathematicians

Berlin, August 18-27, 1998

Abstracts of Short Communications and Poster Sessions

This page includes abstracts of Short Communications and Poster Sessions by ordinary members of the ICM 1998 received before June 1, 1998. Abstracts submitted later by ordinary members and presented at the congress wil appear here soon.

The Scientific Committee of the ICM 1998 and the Editor are not responsible for the content of the abstracts. The abstracts do not constitute a part of the published proceedings of ICM 1998.

Abstracts are ordered by sections and, within each section, alphabetically by the name of the presenter.

Every abstract is given here in the formats postscript (ps), gzip compressed postscript (ps.gz), dvi and gzip compressed dvi (dvi.ps).

Total Abstract Volume, A4 format, Postscript, 391 pages: ps.gz (1.7 Mbyte), ps (3.9 Mbyte)

1. Logic

2. Algebra

3. Number Theory and Arithmetic Algebraic Geometry

4. Algebraic Geometry

5. Differential Geometry and Global Analysis

6. Topology

7. Lie Groups and Lie Algebras

8. Analysis

9. Ordinary Differential Equations and Dynamical Systems

10. Partial Differential Equations

11. Mathematical Physics

12. Probability and Statistics

13. Combinatorics

14. Mathematical Aspects of Computer Science

15. Numerical Analysis and Scientific Computing

16. Applications

17. Control Theory and Optimization

18. Teaching and Popularization of Mathematics

19. History of Mathematics

20. Special Activities of the ICM 1998
